basics.name: Anh Hoang Chu
basics.label: Software Engineer at Microsoft
basics.summary: I'm a Software Engineer who is passionate about working with data and bringing data insights closer to business users through the help of technology. I have experience in data engineering, big data, data science, data warehouse, back-end databases for web application on GCP, Azure and AWS. My tech stacks are Python, SQL, Linux, PySpark, Kafka, Airflow, Tableau, Kubernetes, BigQuery, Redshift, and Azure Synapse Analytics

work.name: Microsoft
work.description: Microsoft Corporation is an American multinational technology corporation - the world 3rd largest compary by Market Cap
work.summary: Software Engineer building, configuring, and managing back-end infrastructure for Flipgrid, a video-powered social-learning platform
highlights: Ensure highly available and performant application by maintaining a multitude of Azure and AWS cloud services include Kubernetes, storage, database, data warehouse, content delivery network, monitoring, elastic searching and caching
Build and maintain data lakehouse platform using Kafka streaming service, Azure PostgreSQL Citus Hyperscale, Azure EventHub, and Azure Synapse Analytics

work.name: Walmart Technology
work.description: Walmart is a Multinational Retail Corporation - Fortune 1 by Revenue
work.summary: Software Engineer building an end-to-end analytical Supply Chain web application to track inventory and transportation from Suppliers to Stores for international markets
highlights: Built and maintained ETL data pipeline to calculate KPIs and load analytical datasets to MSSQL from multiple data sources in Teradata, BigQuery, Oracle Database, Informix Database and flat files using Linux shell scripts, Vim and Cron

Led a team of 4 developers in the enterprise-wide effort to migrate On-prem Data Warehouse (Teradata) to Google Cloud Platform for 10 markets using Big Query, Dataproc, PySpark, and Aiflow as a Service on Astronomer

Continuously delivered new data features and KPIs to the analytics web application by analyzing and calculating supply chain metrics with advanced queries, Spark SQL and Spark Dataframe for data transformation; as well as perform data validation and unit testing to ensure data quality

Improved application performance by 70% with the implementation of caching, indexing and data aggregation in the database instead of in back-end web service, which reduced the volume of data flow through the network.
Reduced development time and codebase complexity by 80% with code refactoring, SQL reformating, CI/CD pipeline and version control (Git/GitHub) in ETL process

work.name: NTT Data Services
work.description: NTT DATA is a multinational IT consulting corporation
work.summary: Led a team of 2 Tableau developers in gathering requirements and delivering analytical projects that provide data democratization to the healthcare account IT service team
highlights: Designed and distributed ~50 operations and financial KPI reports to executives and leaders resulting in the reduction of outstanding IT tickets by 70% using Excel, Tableau, SQL Server and Alteryx
Reduced time to deliver data insights to the operations team by 90% with a new reporting process that automates existing ad-hoc reports from Excel into interactive and dynamic dashboards in Tableau

work.name: E2Open, Inc
work.description: E2open is a leading network-based provider of cloud-based, end-to-end supply chain management software
work.summary: Worked with Director of Business Value Delivery to create business insights and sales portfolio through operations and financial KPIs
highlights: Collected, cleaned, and prepared data from financial reports of 200 companies to calculate 20 different business and supply chain KPIs ranging from Profitability to Efficiency Indicators: Profits Margin, Cash Conversion Cycle, DIO (Days Inventory Outstanding), DSO (Days Sales Outstanding), DPO (Days Payable Outstanding), etc.

Developed financial and supply chain KPI dashboards using Excel (VBA), PowerPoint, and QlikView for sales consultants in the USA and EU to leverage the service quality and product offerings to potential and existing clients

awards.title: Excellence Award
awards.summary: Consistent and examplary demonstration of aspiration with significant contribution to business

awards.title: Fourth-place Winner APICS Terra Grande Competition
awards.summary: Competed with teams from UT Dallas, UT Arlington, Texas A&M, University of Houston in the Fresh Connection Simulation Competition

awards.title: Third-place Winner Operations Competition
awards.summary: Forecasted 2-year demand for a small business with Holt-Winters and ARIMA method using R. Competed with 30 teams from 4 schools in Texas

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Demonstrated academic achievements through GPA and competitions

awards.title: First-place Winner in 2 Supply Chain Case Competitions
awards.awarder: Supply Chain Leadership Council, UT Dallas
awards.summary: Proposed the optimal supply network design to reduce operating expense of a mattress company by 21% while improving service level to 94%. Competed with 20 teams from UT Dallas, SMU, UT Arlington

awards.title: Hero Horse Award
awards.awarder: Hong Kong Shanghai Banking Corporation (HSBC) Vietnam
awards.summary: Awarded to the top sales and service associates with best sale results quarterly
